game.description: Pink Sox is a collection of adult-themed mini-games in various genres. It includes a short sci-fi Japanese-style adventure in which the protagonist explores a space ship by selecting commands from a menu; another mini-adventure with three commands ("Look", "Talk" and "Hear") that invariably leads to a seduction scene; a simple card game that allows the player to bet money against an old gambler; a sliding puzzle game that unlocks an erotic picture; and a mini-game that combines elements of quiz with tile-matching puzzle, also leading to an erotic image.
game.name: Pink Sox
